name: Beach Heat: Miami
overview: Beach Heat: Miami is a television series which takes place in Miami Beach, Florida. This series is somewhat similar to the 90's television hit Baywatch. The second season premiered in the Winter of 2011. The show was shot exclusively in South Florida and is not expected to return for a third season.

episodes.name: Virgin Meat on the Beach
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 premiere, the Miami lifeguards welcome a new addition to their team, a blonde, virgin bombshell named Brooke; Lana seduces Jace and comes up with a devious plan.

episodes.name: Hang and Bang
episodes.overview: Cale asks Brooke to go out with him and is turned down but Jace comes to the rescue with two hot tourists; Melanie meets up with her ex-girlfriend for a nighttime rendezvous.

episodes.name: Trolling for Trouble
episodes.overview: After a beautiful woman is stung by a jellyfish, Jace and Cale are there to help; Amber hooks up with C-Train and makes a devious deal with his bodyguard, Lee.

episodes.name: The Safe Word Is Monkey
episodes.overview: Lana takes Tantra to a new level with her client Charley; Keith's plan to loosen up Brooke for Melanie backfires; Amber sets up C-train and his friend with two hotties.

episodes.name: The Wrong Drink Can Lead to an STD
episodes.overview: Brady can't resist when Jace's gorgeous sister Sammy comes to visit; Brooke gets her chance to join the lifeguard sisterhood; Amber pimps out an unsuspecting Chloe.

episodes.name: Payback and Prostitution
episodes.overview: Lana gets herself into serious trouble and turns to Brooke for help; Chloe vows revenge on Amber and comes up with the perfect plan; Jace has some fun in the tower with a beautiful girl.

episodes.name: Make Up Sex
episodes.overview: Amber comes to Melanie for help; much to Cale's dismay, Jace hooks up with Michelle and Tracy; Chloe makes a move on C-Train.

episodes.name: Sex with the Boss
episodes.overview: Amber executes her revenge on Chloe; Lana takes an interest in Dean; Brooke blows off Cale and hooks up with an old girlfriend from boarding school.

episodes.name: Sabotage Sex
episodes.overview: Vinny returns to torment Lana; Cale tries to make Brooke jealous by hooking up with Kitty; Amber attempts to win back C-Train with a beautiful present.

episodes.name: Old Habits and New Tricks
episodes.overview: Jace gets dominated by a beautiful brunette; Cale takes Brooke on their first date; Dean and Lana decide to make their relationship official.

episodes.name: Forced to Cheat
episodes.overview: Lana's world begins its downward spiral; Amber has officially won her way back into C-Train's bed; Cale continues to pursue Brooke.

episodes.name: Spreading Her Wings, I Mean Legs
episodes.overview: Jace loses a rescue and turns to Melanie for comfort; Lana decides to replace her ad; Cale cooks dinner for Brooke in hopes of finally having sex with her.

episodes.name: Karma and Cocaine Hook Ups
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Brady continues to chase after Melanie, and is finally successful; Amber makes a plan with Lee to exploit Chloe; a surprise awaits Brooke at the Club.

episodes.name: Back to the Beach
episodes.overview: Jack convinces ex-lifeguard Shannon Richards to return to South Beach. Ariel learns how to use a stud finder. Fletch and Jordan break the ice with the girls over drinks and a game of "I Never".

episodes.name: Lifeguard Chicks Are Hot
episodes.overview: The boys spot and early morning sexy sunbather. Ariel and Cassidy are grateful when Bohdi helps them find a home. The lifeguards save an unlikely tourist. Haley joins the new crew.

episodes.name: Blinded by Booty
episodes.overview: Online tabloid magazine The Dirty's sexy reporter Roxanne Riley seduces an unsuspecting Fletch. Ariel and Cassidy give new meaning to the term 'house warming party'.

episodes.name: Dirty Pictures Private Play
episodes.overview: Haley, Ariel and Cassidy devise a plan to get back at Roxanne. Fletch loses a sports bet to a beautiful girl from L.A. Roxanne takes secret sexy pictures of a celebrity couple.

episodes.name: Roxanne Gets Laid and Played
episodes.overview: The guys enlist the help of their muscle bound trainer and plan their own revenge on the lustful Roxanne. Sexy barmaid Dylan teaches Bohdi the proper way to do a body shot.

episodes.name: Bangin' Sparks
episodes.overview: Roxanne gets fired when sex pictures surface; glamour girl turned PR agent, Melania, is brought in.

episodes.name: The Sluttiest Delinquents in South Beach
Quickies and Limbo Lines
episodes.overview: Things get hot for Haley when security catches her sneaking in to The Dirty. The lifeguards host Melania's Limbo Love-In. Shannon's boyfriend Paul shows up for a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Love Lust Lets Just Get It On
